ActivityFieldHistory.name: ActivityFieldHistory
ActivityFieldHistory.description: Represents a change in a field value for a tracked object or field.

ActivityId.description: The ID of the task or event that changed.

ChangedById.description: The ID of the user who made the change.

ChangedDate.description: The date the field value changed.

DataType.description: The type of the field with the changed value.

FieldName.description: The name of the field changed.

IsDataAvailable.description: Indicates whether valid data is available in the old and new value fields. This field is false if, for example, the fields are encrypted or the changed values are too large, such as for Description field types.

NewValueDateTime.description: The new value for date type fields.

NewValueNumber.description: The new value for number type fields.

NewValueText.description: The new value for all other field types that are not a date or number type.

OldValueDateTime.description: Old value for date type fields.

OldValueNumber.description: Old value for number type fields.

OldValueText.description: The old value for all other field types that are not a date or number type.

Operation.description: The operation of the field value change.
